task.title: Notifying Members about Workflow Stamps
task.shortdesc: When you stamp a workflow object you can send a notification to other CWRC members. This allows users to keep team members up to date with project editing.

taskbody.context: The instruction proceed from the Stamping log entries. You must be logged into assign workflow entries.

step.cmd: In the workflow stamp form, expand the notification section.
Add the members that you would like to notify as well as any subject and message that you would like to include.
step.info: CWRC members are sent notification to the email that they sign up to CWRC using. Some CWRC users opt out of getting project wide notifications (for more information see ____), if you would like to make sure that everyone you are notifying get the email, select the Force Mail Notification at the top of the form.
